history.proof: intros. unfold ex_pseries, PS_minus. qsimpl time: 2. qsimpl time: 2 use: is_pseries_minus. hfcrush depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: intros K V b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x H1 H2.
intros K' V' b' a' x' H1 H2.

exceptions.exn: Unable to find an instance for the variable x.

In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K a, b : nat -> V x : K x0 : V H1 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (b k)) x0 x1 : V H0 : is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (a k)) x1 Unable to unify "forall P : V -> Prop, locally (plus ?M2713 (opp ?M2714)) P -> filtermap (sum_n (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n ?M2712 k) (PS_minus ?M2710 ?M2711 k))) eventually P" with "exists l : V, is_series (fun k : nat => scal (pow_n x k) (plus (a k) (opp (b k)))) l".

original: intros K V b a x H1 H2. unfold ex_pseries, PS_minus. intros [la Hla] [lb Hlb]. split. - apply is_pseries_minus; auto. -
